page.title: 06ST.MARGARET'S C.P.SCHOOL.
page.content: Our primary school is a small but quite modern village school.It was built in 1971 on a field next to Portal House.Previously children had attended the old school which was in Kingsdown Road. The school has 5 classes with one spare classroom which is used for Music and Television.There is one hall in which we do PE and eat our lunch. There are 160 pupils in the school- they are mainly village children-and six members of staff. Mrs.Pendlebury-Green(headteacher) Mr.Hares (deputy) Mrs.Pepper Mr.Pegg Mrs.Powell Mrs.Cripps
